author: Simon Difford
description: Blueberries, lime and apple combine with and are fortified by bourbon.
name: Kentucky Muffin
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
(Or reduce sugar syrup to 10ml (1/3oz) and serve over cubed ice
